audioclip_h.introTxt1: Audio clips can be played when an event occurs or manually from the Live View page. Audio clips are created either by recording sound using a microphone or by uploading a sound file to the Axis product. Listed here are the audio clips that have been added. Follow the instructions below to add new clips, play, download, modify and remove clips.
audioclip_h.introTxt2: Audio clips can be played when an event occurs or manually from the Live View page. Audio clips are created either by recording sound using the product's microphone or by uploading a sound file to the Axis product. Listed here are the audio clips that have been added to the product. Follow the instructions below to add new clips, play, download, modify and remove clips.

Follow the instructions below to add new clips, play, download, modify and remove clips.
audioclip_h.listintroTxt: New audio clips can be recorded or uploaded to the product. Click the Add button. The dialog expands with two choices Record and Upload.

audioclip_h.micro2Txt: To record a new clip using the product's microphone:
audioclip_h.listTxt3: If the recording should not start at once upon clicking the Record... button, enter the number of seconds to wait before recording actually starts.
audioclip_h.listTxt4: Enter the number of seconds to record.
audioclip_h.listTxt5: Note: The number of seconds entered in each of the field wait for and recording for should not be greater than
audioclip_h.listTxt6: seconds. To increase the maximum values for these fields please set the value for System.BoaKeepAliveTimeout parameter to a higher number.
audioclip_h.listTxt8: The status LED on the product will flash amber while waiting and flash red while recording.
audioclip_h.listNoteTxt: Note: You may want to adjust the Input gain under Audio Settings for best audio quality.
audioclip_h.listTxt10: To upload a file from a local hard drive or network disk, select the Upload radio button and click the Browse button. Navigate to the desired file and click Upload....
audioclip_h.filetypeTxt1: Allowed audio clips for uploading are:
audioclip_h.workTxt1: Play - To hear a clip play, select an audio clip and click Play.
audioclip_h.workTxt2: Download - To download a recording to a hard drive or network disk, select it and click Download.
audioclip_h.workTxt3: Modify - Change the name of the audio clip.
audioclip_h.workTxt4: Remove - Select the audio clip to delete and click Remove.
